titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to except certain individuals from the 80 percent taxable income limitation on net operating loss carryovers.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to except certain individuals from the 80 percent taxable income limitation on net operating loss carryovers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill exempts taxpayers whose modified adjusted gross income does not exceed $400,000 in a taxable year from the 80% taxable income limit on net operating loss carryovers.
